quote_raw:
Good morning, Johnny, said the ship. "It is 5.38 a.m."
"What?" said Johnny. "It’s Saturday."
"I told you he wouldn’t like it," said Sol, presumably to Kovac.
"It’s hardly a matter of likes or dislikes," said the computer. "I have information I deem important enough to pass on at the earliest opportunity – whatever time it is."
title: Johnny Mackintosh: Battle for Earth
author: Keith Mansfield
